Params: {3: 'Nanami dashes past you, then jogs back.'}
{3: 'Before you can answer, Nanami grabs your arm.'}
{3: "And that's how you find yourself dragged to the entrance of a small Kowloong-style courtyard."}
{3: 'Nanami hops up the steps and swings the gate open, revealing a yard filled with mechanical parts, Power just chilling in the corner.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I snagged it from a crashed transport craft outside the city.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The Little League's all hands on deck for the commercial street event, and I want to pitch in.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'So Nanami is building a suuuuper big mechanical magpie!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Somehow, you are already picking up parts and getting to work before you know it.'}
{3: 'Likewise, somehow you end up buying paint for Nanami and start assembling this "magpie."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami even considers outfitting Power with wings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But Power excels in brute strength, not aerial prowess. Characters can't simply defy their core design, can they?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Clicking the tail section into place, it hits you—something's seriously wrong."}
{3: "The tail definitely isn't magpie-ish. More like..."}
{3: 'Nanami shoves you, dazed and confused, into the "cabin" she whipped up just moments ago.'}
{2: "Wait a minute, how's a pterodactyl supposed to get airborne?!", 3: '69'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Alright, alright, buckle up. It's launch time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami slams a button, and the pterodactyl screeches.'}
{2: 'Why did you even bother adding that feature?!', 3: '76'}
{3: "Fire erupts from the pterodactyl's tail, bathing the courtyard in a wave of heat. But weirdly, nothing actually catches fire."}
{3: 'Did Nanami pre-emptively fireproof the whole area before picking this spot?'}
{3: 'The yard is definitely trashed from Power\'s "training," but that still doesn\'t explain why you are soaring over Constellia in a mechanical pterodactyl...'}
{3: 'Peering down, you see a flock of actual, mechanical magpies cutting through the sky.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'See that? Genius, right? I just cranked these out, one for every corner.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Regardless, the pterodactyl and its magpie posse cruise over the cityscape. From the cabin, you can clearly see people craning their necks to gawk at this "spectacle."'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'There you go—a power-up sticker! Boosts both brains and brawn by 20%. Seems a bit much, honestly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maxed out already.', 3: '92', 4: 'This could come in handy.', 5: '94'}
{3: 'Nanami plasters a sticker on her face that declares, in no uncertain terms, "Nanami is the Best."'}
